Keywords: Amazon , Batman Family , Gotham City , Justice League , Kryptonian , Metropolis , Reporter , Trinity
Real Name: Clark Kent
Team Up
1
TEAM UP: BATMAN, WONDER WOMAN: If a listed friendly character is on the map and Superman uses RALLY to choose a character with Batman team ability, Superman team ability, or Wonder Woman team ability, the chosen character removes all action tokens instead.
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Destroy Blocking
RALLY (1): Friendly Attack Rolls . FREE: Remove one of Superman's RALLY dice to remove an action token from a friendly character within range.
ARCTIC BREATH: When Superman hits with a range attack, choose one to last until your next turn:
*a hit target can't use STOP
*a hit target gains Immobile.
